mapper.select:
SELECT cm.* FROM t_car_monthly_vehicle as cm
AND cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}
and ((cm.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.owner_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.phone like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}))
AND cm.car_position like CONCAT('%',#{query.carPosition},'%')
AND cm.monthly_method_id = #{query.monthlyMethodId}
AND cm.end_time < now()
AND cm.end_time > now()
AND cm.deleted=0

SELECT cm.*/*,cp.house_id*/ FROM t_car_monthly_vehicle as cm /*left join t_car_position as cp on cm.car_position=cp.car_position*/
AND cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}
and ((cm.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.owner_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.phone like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}))
AND cm.car_position like CONCAT('%',#{query.carPosition},'%')
AND cm.end_time < now()
AND cm.end_time > now()

SELECT cm.* FROM t_car_monthly_vehicle as cm
AND cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}
and ((cm.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.owner_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.phone like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}))
AND cm.car_position like CONCAT('%',#{query.carPosition},'%')
AND cm.monthly_method_id = #{query.monthlyMethodId}
AND cm.end_time < now()
AND cm.end_time > now()

SELECT cm.*/*,cp.house_id*/ FROM t_car_monthly_vehicle as cm /*left join t_car_position as cp on cm.car_position=cp.car_position*/
AND cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}
and ((cm.car_number like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.owner_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}) or (cm.phone like CONCAT('%',#{query.carNumber},'%') and cm.community_id = #{query.communityId}))
AND cm.car_position like CONCAT('%',#{query.carPosition},'%')
AND cm.end_time < now()
AND cm.end_time > now()
